sentences.en: An icy wind swept through the streets.
He braced himself for the icy plunge into the black water.
sentences.cn: 他做好了准备要跳进冰冷的脏水里。

sentences.en: He hesitated before diving into the icy water.
sentences.cn: 在跳进冰水之前他犹豫了一阵.

sentences.en: I found it hard to keep my balance on the icy path.
sentences.cn: 我觉得在冰滑小道上走路要保持身体平衡是相当困难的.

sentences.en: It'seems quite warm today by contrast with yesterday's icy wind.
sentences.cn: 与昨天凛冽的寒风一比,今天可算相当暖和了.

sentences.en: Motorists have been warned to beware of icy roads.
sentences.cn: 已经提醒开车的人当心冰封的路面。

sentences.en: Several pedestrians had come to grief on the icy pavement.
sentences.cn: 几个行人在结冰的人行道上滑倒了.

sentences.en: She fell headlong into the icy pool.
sentences.cn: 她倒栽葱掉进了冰冷的水池中。

sentences.en: She fixed her questioner with an icy glare.
The bath water was icy cold.
The icy coldness of the water revived her.
sentences.cn: 水刺骨的寒冷使她苏醒过来.

sentences.en: They were forcing her head under the icy waters, drowning her.
sentences.cn: 他们用力把她的头按到冰冷的水中，想淹死她。

sentences.en: They were getting drenched by icy water.
sentences.cn: 他们被冰冷的水浇透了。

sentences.en: Two cars skidded on the icy pavement.
sentences.cn: 两辆汽车在结冰的路面上打滑。

sentences.en: With characteristic rashness and valor, Peter plunged into the icy water.
sentences.cn: 以他惯有的冲动和勇气，彼得一头扎进了冰冷的水中。
